scripts.install:all: npm i && cd src/frontend/markdown-viewer && npm i
scripts.build:frontend: cd src/frontend/markdown-viewer && npm run build && cd ../../.. && node scripts/markdown-post-build.cjs
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:css && cp -r public/ dist/
scripts.build:server: esbuild src/backend/server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=es2024 --outdir=dist --sourcemap --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.build:server:watch: esbuild src/backend/server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --target=es2024 --outdir=dist --sourcemap --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --watch
scripts.dev: cross-env PORT=8080 HOST=127.0.0.1 tsx watch src/backend/server.ts
